rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {AFF3651%, AFW3651, BFW3651, DEB365, DEB3651%, FIN365, FIN3651}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFW2401, BFF2401, BFW2401} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Treasury functions; risk assessment evaluation; strategy formulation and implementation; liquidity and cash management; audit and control.
